entities.description: Romilda Vane was amongst them. She is one of the students who were playing Quidditch.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry was starting to get seriously annoyed. He is the one who is trying to organize the game.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The fifth group were Hufflepuffs, but Harry told everyone else from Gryffindor to leave if they weren't part of that house.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of the Gryffindor house. He told everyone else from Gryffindor to leave if they weren't part of that house.
Romilda Vane is a member of the Gryffindor house. She was amongst them playing Quidditch.
